title: Google\Cloud\Datastream\V1\PostgresqlSourceConfig
name: PostgresqlSourceConfig
description:
PostgreSQL data source configuration

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datastream.v1.PostgresqlSourceConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data

params.description: PostgreSQL objects to include in the stream.

params.description: PostgreSQL objects to exclude from the stream.

params.name: data.replication_slot
params.description: Required. The name of the logical replication slot that's configured with the pgoutput plugin.

params.name: data.publication
params.description: Required. The name of the publication that includes the set of all tables that are defined in the stream's include_objects.
